A

addDirection(String) - Method in class utilities.Recipe
Adds a step to the directions of this recipe.
addIngredient() - Method in class view.GUI
Adds the ingredient typed by the user into the GUI.ingredientSearchBar.
addIngredient(String) - Method in class utilities.Recipe
Adds an ingredient to the ingredients of this recipe.
addPantryItem(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Sends an ingredient to the Model to be added to the user's "virtual pantry".
addPantryItem(String) - Method in class model.Model
Adds an ingredient to the user's "virtual pantry" (Model.pantryList).
addToFavorites(Recipe) - Method in class controller.Controller
Sends a recipe from the View to the Model to add to its user favorites list.
addToFavorites(Recipe) - Method in class model.Model
Adds the given recipe to the user's favorites list.
allIngredients - Variable in class model.Model
List of all ingredients across all recipes in the database.
allIngredients - Variable in class view.GUI
A list of all ingredients in the database.
